channel.title: Heroicscape
channel.description:
Atm heroicscape is just opend its about 3 days old. i already coded a lot in it to try and make it unique - I already added dungeoneering, it works 100% (btw its my own way of dungeoneering so its not like the realy rs or any other private server) - Lots of Nice grafix ect. - I changed godwars to the old 1 because i like it more - Summoning is working 95% (u gotta use the items on the puches) - Its still little, and there are some staff spots open. (but i don't make u staff member if u ask me, u gotta diserf it) - I'm working on Nex and the rest of the bosses now, soon they will be added - spirit beast and torment demons are added. - the server has a great and perfect new home. not like the boring Edgvill - I changed the donator items, so ure able to wear ALL items if ure not a donator, i didn't make this server to make money. i made this server for other people to have fun (i might ask for donations, just because i gotta buy a vps ect.) - herbloreing skill is diff from other server. - money pouch added and working. - u see the exp u gain ea npc u kill or skill u train. - i added a vote shop, donator shop, level shop, pk shop Forums located at : http://heroicscape.top-talk.com/ Our webclient is free atm so i cannot add new items or change grafix (yet) webclient : http://www.rswebclients.com/play/heroicscape123 Now i'll show u some pics:
This is the new home: [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img571/5415/homedp.png[/img]
This is the new back at home: [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img12/7867/bankathome.png[/img]
This is the skilling zone: [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img838/175/skillingzone.png[/img]
This is the dungeoneering place [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img836/5379/dungeoneeringo.png[/img]
This is the first floor in dungeoneering [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img822/7610/dungeoneeringroom1.png[/img]
This is the seccound floor in dungeoneering [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img33/9481/dungeoneeringfloor2.png[/img]
This is the 3rd floor in dungeoneering [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img832/6981/dungeoneeringfloor3.png[/img]
This is the 4rth floor in dungeoneering [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img708/4588/dungeoneeringfloor4.png[/img]
This is the 5th floor in dungeoneering [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img41/47/dungeoneeringfloor5.png[/img]
This is the 6th floor in dungeoneering [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img145/792/dungeoneeringfloor6.png[/img]
This is the 7th floor in dungeoneering [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img835/3495/dungeoneeringfloor7.png[/img]
This is the 8th floor in dungeoneering [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img694/6316/dungeoneeringfloor8.png[/img]
This is the 9th floor in dungeoneering [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img805/3494/dungeoneeringfloor9.png[/img]
This is the final floor in dungeoneering [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img809/9606/lastdungeoneeringfloor.png[/img] If u complete the 10 rooms in dungeoneering u get a nice costume item could be random, from p hat to verac, even dragon hai
This is the donation Store for donation points [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img545/9461/donatorstore.png[/img]
This is the First pking store (still going to change it ect) [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img138/3613/pkstore1.png[/img]
This is the 2ed pking store (still going to change this 1 as well) [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img585/9144/pkstore2.png[/img]
This is the godwars, i putted in. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img19/7181/godwarsx.png[/img]
this is the title shop [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img689/7692/titleshop.png[/img]
This is Squeal of Fortune [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img547/5946/sofk.png[/img]
THis is the donation zone (going to work on that some more as well) [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img266/9996/donatorzoneq.png[/img]
this is the clan chat in the files [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img62/7973/clanchatt.png[/img]
This is the summoning [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img705/9176/summoningn.png[/img]
This is how the items look [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img812/1033/equipmentt.png[/img]
NOTE: It might be changed if u join i fully work on the server and try to update it NOTE 2:i have dylexia so i type a lot of mistakes.

item.title: Heroicscape
item.dc:creator: @Premonition Premonition
item.description:
@Premonition wrote:

Server name changed to Midnight, the server had many amazing updates! Come and play with us!

Latest Updates:
We keep Midnight as our classic server, and creating a 718+ one too! Join today, and follow us to the top!

Read full topic

item.title: Heroicscape
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

YuraK:

yeah, i’m planning to make my own soon. but i still don’t have the efford to try on it, since i gotta add and fix a lot more in game. sometimes its bether to fix the things and make the server good then get a lot of players active.

Uhm… Making a webclient is free. You can also use a free web host to start off as well so you can host an actual site.

Read full topic

item.title: Heroicscape
item.dc:creator: @YuraK YuraK
item.description:
@YuraK wrote:

Atm heroicscape is just opend
its about 3 days old.
i already coded a lot in it to try and make it unique

  • I already added dungeoneering, it works 100% (btw its my own way of dungeoneering so its not like the realy rs or any other private server)
  • Lots of Nice grafix ect.
  • I changed godwars to the old 1 because i like it more
  • Summoning is working 95% (u gotta use the items on the puches)
  • Its still little, and there are some staff spots open. (but i don’t make u staff member if u ask me, u gotta diserf it)
  • I’m working on Nex and the rest of the bosses now, soon they will be added
  • spirit beast and torment demons are added.
  • the server has a great and perfect new home. not like the boring Edgvill
  • I changed the donator items, so ure able to wear ALL items if ure not a donator, i didn’t make this server to make money. i made this server for other people to have fun (i might ask for donations, just because i gotta buy a vps ect.)
  • herbloreing skill is diff from other server.
  • money pouch added and working.
  • u see the exp u gain ea npc u kill or skill u train.
  • i added a vote shop, donator shop, level shop, pk shop
    Forums located at : http://heroicscape.top-talk.com/
    Our webclient is free atm so i cannot add new items or change grafix (yet)
    webclient : http://www.rswebclients.com/play/heroicscape123
    Now i’ll show u some pics:

This is the new home:

could be random, from p hat to verac, even dragon hai
